title: Greenlandic K or Greenlandic k?
content: In a typeface where the uppers and lowers look rather different, would you say the Greenlandic K should look more like a capital, only smaller, or a lowercase, only with capital-like proportions? Specifically, the caps are rather ornate in my current project.
author: Choz Cunningham

comments.content:
I searched everywhere but here!! :) Sorry, TY!
